name: BNNSLayerParametersConvolution
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a convolution layer.

items.name: init(i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, w_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, bias: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, activation: BNNSActivation, x_stride: Int, y_stride: Int, x_dilation_stride: Int, y_dilation_stride: Int, x_padding: Int, y_padding: Int, groups: Int, pad: (Int, Int, Int, Int))
items.desc: Returns a new convolution layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new convolution layer parameters structure.

items.name: var activation: BNNSActivation
items.desc: The activation function that the layer applies to the output.

items.name: var x_stride: Int
items.desc: The width increment of the input image.

items.name: var y_stride: Int
items.desc: The height increment of the input image.

items.name: var x_dilation_stride: Int
items.desc: The width increment between elements in the input image during convolution.

items.name: var y_dilation_stride: Int
items.desc: The height increment between elements in the input image during convolution.

items.name: var x_padding: Int
items.desc: The width padding, which is the number of virtual zeros added to the left and right of each channel.

items.name: var y_padding: Int
items.desc: The height padding, which is the number of virtual zeros added to the top and bottom of each channel.

items.name: var pad: (Int, Int, Int, Int)
items.desc: Padding which is asymmetric and ignored if the width or height padding values are greater than zero.
